MediaEncryptedEvent.summary: The MediaEncryptedEvent interface of the Encrypted Media Extensions API contains the information associated with an event sent to a when some initialization data is encountered in the media.

MediaEncryptedEventMediaEncryptedEvent.summary: The MediaEncryptedEvent constructor creates a new object.

blockquote.para: In normal cases, you don't need to call this constructor in your code as such events are usually generated by the browser when needed.

MediaEncryptedEventInitData.summary: The read-only initData property of the returns the initialization data contained in this event, if any.
MediaEncryptedEventInitData.value: A with the initialization data, or null if there are none.

MediaEncryptedEventInitDataType.summary: The read-only initDataType property of the returns a case-sensitive string describing the type of the initialization data associated with this event.
